distribution.text: Copyright 2024 SUSE LLC. All rights reserved.

notes.text:
This update for ghostscript fixes the following issues:

Security issue fixed:

- CVE-2019-10216: Fix privilege escalation via specially crafted PostScript file (bsc#1144621).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: In ghostscript before version 9.50, the .buildfont1 procedure did not properly secure its privileged calls, enabling scripts to bypass `-dSAFER` restrictions. An attacker could abuse this flaw by creating a specially crafted PostScript file that could escalate privileges and access files outside of restricted areas.
notes.title: Vulnerability description
